column4: yeah, I don't dabble in linux, i use it lol. I do have a win7 box have already set up the dual boot.
I was just wondering if wubi could run the LTS, as i've not looked at it enough myself. I want to start the rest of my family out on linux.
and trying it out on wubi is much better than a live cd or usb
i think wubi can load any ISO if it's in the same directory as the .exe ; doing this from win of course
